structure.unit: Officers And Inmates Of Penal And Reformatory Institutions. Paroles And Pardons

law.text: The price of all articles and materials supplied by the prisons to the commonwealth, counties, cities and towns shall conform as nearly as may be to the wholesale market rates for similar goods manufactured outside of the prisons. Any difference of opinion in regard to price may be submitted to arbitration in the manner provided in section fifty-five.
